other_tests.findings: Prominent diverticula with surrounding inflammation and thickening of the sigmoid colon consistent with diverticulitis. No free air or drainable fluid collection.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The partially calcified soft tissue density structure in the right pelvis, likely representing prior renal transplant, is unchanged compared to prior.

other_tests.findings: Regular rate and rhythm, normal S1 + split S2, no murmurs, rubs, gallops.
